name: Niwa Coffee Table
description: Designed in 2011 by No√© Duchaufour-Lawrance, the Niwa Coffee Table draws inspiration from iconic Japanese gardens, known as 'Niwa', which are central courtyards within traditional Eastern architecture featuring water, rocks, and plants. Symbolizing these tranquil gardens, the coffee table seamlessly integrates North American walnut with a sleek black nickel-finished metal frame, embodying these elements in its structure and design. The tabletop is made from thickened 15mm ultra-transparent tempered glass, available in rectangular shapes in two sizes. Through its design, Niwa invites an interplay between human spaces and the natural world.
